title: Yedhedho Ennam Vandhu Lyrics  Amara Kaaviyam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Yedhedho Ennam Vandhu
Singer(s): Haricharan, Padmalatha
Movie: Amara Kaaviyam (2014)
Music: M.Ghibran
Lyrics: Parvathy

Yedhedho enna vandhu
en nenjai thaiththu poga
Yedhedho enna vandhu
en nenjai thaiththu poga

nee sonna vaarththai ellaam
naan odhum vedham aaga.
ennai un kannil kandu kollavaa
thozh thottaal vaanil neendhi sellava
thaenthuli pechchil serththaai
thithippai nenjil vaarththaai.

Yedhedho enna vandhu
en nenjai thaiththu poga

Unnai thottu vandha pinnaal
kattril yedho mattram kandaen.
vaasam vannam poosi kondu
thendral vandhu nirkka kandaen.

Pogum vazhi engum mounam
ennai killum
nee irundhum dhoorangal selvom.

Payanam engae mudindhaal enna
unnai thaanguven naan
veelndhidum varai.

Yedhedho enna vandhu
en nenjai thaiththu poga

Thizhil mella saayum nodi
pookkum pudhu thoppul kodi.
Thaagam kondu ullam vandhaal
theervai tharum undhan madi.

Annai thandhai sondham uyirthodum
bandam ellaamey aaneye neeye.
uyirn thadam aliyum munnal
unnai paarthida naa engiye nirppen.

Yedhedho enna vandhu
en nenjai thaiththu poga

nee sonna vaarththai ellaam
naan odhum vedham aaga.
ennai un kannil kandu kollavaa
thozh thottaal vaanil neendhi sellava
thaenthuli pechchil serththaai
thithippai nenjil vaarththaai.Â
